title: Fix memory leaks in MAUI views
body:
**Description of Change**

It is very easy to create a circular reference in iOS and we had a few. When you have an event from a platform view to another instance that then references that platform view, you get an un-collectable set.

This PR breaks this chain by making the platform view have an event on a proxy object that has a _weak_ reference to handlers and/or virtual views.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #2923

<!-- Provide links to issues here. Ensure that a GitHub issue was created for your feature or bug fix before sending PR. -->

None.

-->

None.
